meanings: (못 보고 빠뜨림) passing over, failure to notice, (묵인함) connivance, overlooking, 간과하다 pass over, fail to notice, connive (at), wink (at), overlook
(무기) shields and spears, arms, weapons, (전쟁) warfare
take up arms against each other

vlive.korean: 이런 것들을 우리가 간과해서는 안 되겠죠? We can't fail to notice these things, right? 듣기 View video WINNER : How to 멋
vlive.english: We can't fail to notice these things, right?

vlive.korean: 다들 본인의 입술을 간과하고 있어. I think everyone underestimates their lips. 듣기 View video KWAK TORI : 곽토리&려리<명란립대잔치> - Comet Beauty Festival 커밋뷰티페스티벌
vlive.english: I think everyone underestimates their lips.

vlive.korean: 시간이 너무 많이 남네요. 1시간을 내가 너무 간과했어. I have too much time. I underestimated one hour. 듣기 View video VIXX : Beats by Ravi
vlive.english: I have too much time. I underestimated one hour.

vlive.korean: 여러분이 지금 간과하고 있는 게 어떤 곡이 들어가 있을지 몰라요, 여러분. Nobody knows which song is in the album. 듣기 View video Block B : 박경이랑 아갓츄츄츄💞
vlive.english: Nobody knows which song is in the album.

vlive.korean: 제목에 대해 많은 사람들이 간과하고 있지 않나 하는 생각이 들어요. I think a lot of people are overlooking the title. 듣기 View video BTS : BTS Live : WINGS Behind story by RM
vlive.english: I think a lot of people are overlooking the title.

examples.korean: His kindness did not go unnoticed by his staff. 발음듣기 그의 친절을 그의 직원들이 간과하지 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His kindness did not go unnoticed by his staff. 발음

examples.korean: He seems to have overlooked one important fact. 발음듣기 그가 한 가지 중요한 사실을 간과한 것 같다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He seems to have overlooked one important fact. 발음

examples.korean: We cannot overlook the significance of the attached e-mail from Angelo Equipment. 발음듣기 Angelo Equipment 사에서 보내온 첨부 메일의 중요성을 간과해선 안 됩니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: We cannot overlook the significance of the attached e-mail from Angelo Equipment. 발음

examples.korean: Motherism ignores the value of housekeeping and child-rearing. 발음듣기 전업주부에 대한 무시는 가정을 돌보고 아이를 기르는 것의 가치를 간과하는 처사이다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: Motherism ignores the value of housekeeping and child-rearing. 발음

examples.korean: Banner blindness shouldn't be neglected when estimating the influence of online marketing campaigns. 발음듣기 온라인 마케팅의 영향력을 가늠할 때 배너 광고 회피를 간과하지 말아야 한다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: Banner blindness shouldn't be neglected when estimating the influence of online marketing campaigns. 발음
